root: ^Hey, c’mere lad, let me tell you a story!
^I’m cinnamon and I’m the town’s carpenter.
^This city might not look like much.
^But we’re all doing honest work in this town.
^We have just forgotten how to trust in each other.
^Has been working with me for years now.
^so, I’m building him a great boardgame table.
^but I still need to figure out how to implement the lights and it’s a skill I don’t really have.
^oh, you might know a guy you say?
^Hope you can help me out with this.
